description:
NTS Map: 082E12, Naramata Waterfall . Beautiful 75' tall waterfall in Naramata B.C. 
GPS download includes:
-Track
-Waypoints
-Route
Secluded not vary well known. Pools of deep water in and just before the falls for a dip on a hot summers day. Hard to find spot without GPS, no trail markings, with just a bit of a grownover trail. Marked on GPS download is the easiest way in.
Trail head begins off Naramata road at cedar park. just park and walk the path to the falls, follows creek and rock bluffs. Start of trail warning of poision ivy and rattlesnakes.
title: Naramata WaterFall
